people.name: Plato
people.bio: A philosopher in Classical Greece and the founder of the Academy in Athens.

people.name: Aristotle
people.bio: An ancient Greek philosopher and scientist born in the city of Stagira.

people.name: William Shakespeare
people.bio: An English playwright, poet, and actor, widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language.

people.name: Jane Austen
people.bio: An English novelist known primarily for her six major novels.

packs.name: Scientists
packs.description: Journey through the lives of groundbreaking scientists.

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.bio: Theoretical physicist known for the theory of relativity and the equation E=mc^2.

people.name: Marie Curie
people.bio: Pioneer in the study of radioactivity and the first person to win Nobel Prizes in two different scientific fields.

people.name: Isaac Newton
people.bio: Influential mathematician and physicist, famous for his laws of motion and universal gravitation.

people.name: Nikola Tesla
people.bio: Inventor and electrical engineer known for his pioneering work on alternating current electrical systems.

people.name: Stephen Hawking
people.bio: Theoretical physicist and cosmologist known for his work on black holes and the nature of the universe.

people.name: Rosalind Franklin
people.bio: Chemist and X-ray crystallographer whose work was central to understanding the molecular structures of DNA.

packs.name: Artists
packs.description: Explore the creativity and vision of renowned artists.

people.name: Leonardo da Vinci
people.bio: Italian polymath of the Renaissance known for his works such as the Mona Lisa and The Last Supper.

people.name: Vincent van Gogh
people.bio: Dutch post-impressionist painter famous for works like Starry Night and Sunflowers.

people.name: Pablo Picasso
people.bio: Spanish painter, sculptor, printmaker, and one of the most influential artists of the 20th century.

people.name: Claude Monet
people.bio: French painter, a founder of French Impressionist painting.

people.name: Frida Kahlo
people.bio: Mexican painter known for her many portraits and works inspired by the nature and artifacts of Mexico.

packs.name: Musicians
packs.description: Discover the stories of influential musicians and composers.

people.name: Ludwig van Beethoven
people.bio: German composer and pianist, a crucial figure in the transition between the Classical and Romantic eras in Western music.

people.name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
people.bio: Influential composer of the Classical era, known for his symphonies, concertos, and operas.

people.name: Johann Sebastian Bach
people.bio: German composer and musician of the Baroque period, known for compositions such as the Brandenburg Concertos.

people.name: Freddie Mercury
people.bio: British singer-songwriter and the lead vocalist of the rock band Queen, known for his flamboyant stage persona and powerful vocals.

people.name: Aretha Franklin
people.bio: American singer, songwriter, and civil rights activist, known as the 'Queen of Soul' and famous for songs like 'Respect'.

packs.name: World Leaders
packs.description: Profiles of influential leaders throughout history and current times.

packs.name: Culinary Masters
packs.description: A journey through the lives and creations of renowned chefs and culinary experts.

people.name: Gordon Ramsay
people.bio: British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality, known for his fiery temper and high standards in the kitchen.

people.name: Julia Child
people.bio: American cooking teacher, author, and television personality, known for bringing French cuisine to the American public.

people.name: Anthony Bourdain
people.bio: American chef, author, and travel documentarian, known for his explorations of international culture, cuisine, and the human condition.

people.name: Massimo Bottura
people.bio: Italian restaurateur and an innovative chef, known for his three-Michelin-star restaurant Osteria Francescana.

people.name: Ferran Adrià
people.bio: Spanish chef famous for molecular gastronomy, and the former head chef of the elBulli restaurant.

packs.name: Cinema Legends
packs.description: Profiles of iconic film directors, actors, and movie industry pioneers.

packs.name: Sports Heroes
packs.description: Stories of legendary athletes and sports personalities.

packs.name: Adventure and Explorers
packs.description: Profiles of famous explorers and adventurers.
